panels.description: Total unique peers seen in the network in MSG_PING messages.
panels.title: Gossip Peers

panels.description: Average node peers as reported by MSG_NODE_INFO message.
panels.title: Node Peers

targets.expr: sum without(__name__, Time, instance, job, networkId) (aemon_peer_status{networkId="$networkId", lat != "0", kind="seed"})
sum without(__name__, Time, instance, job, networkId) (aemon_peer_status{networkId="$networkId", lat!="0", kind!="seed"})

aemon_peer_status{networkId="$networkId"} * on (publicKey) group_left(version, revision, vendor, os) aemon_peer_info{networkId="$networkId"} or on (publicKey) aemon_peer_status{networkId="$networkId"}
